  "description": "Mshel Homes Limited is a real estate development and marketing company incorporated in 2018 with a unique vision to be the leading real estate company in Nigeria, with an outstanding reputation for honesty, integrity and impeccable customer service.

At Mshel Homes Limited our mission is to create a lifetime relationship with our clientele by deliverying property solutions through innovative and technological driven processes that caters to your real estate needs whilst adhering to the highest standards, systems and performance goals necessary to achieving your dreams.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Email Marketing Specialist

Job Locations:&nbsp;Abuja

Job&nbsp;Description


	The Email Marketing Specialist is responsible for planning, executing, and optimizing email marketing campaigns that generate leads, nurture prospects, and increase customer engagement for Mshel Homes Limited.
	This role ensures the effective use of email automation, audience segmentation, and compelling content to support the company&rsquo;s sales and marketing objectives in the real estate industry.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute email marketing campaigns for property promotions, newsletters, client nurturing, and brand awareness.
	Design engaging email templates aligned with the company&rsquo;s brand identity.
	Manage end-to-end campaign processes: planning, scheduling, automation, testing, deployment, and reporting.
	Build and maintain email lists through lead generation activities (web forms, events, social media, landing pages).
	Segment audiences based on buyer personas, interests, and stage in the sales funnel.
	Ensure clean, updated, and compliant contact lists.
	Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to create compelling, conversion-focused email copy.
	Generate quality leads through email campaigns.&nbsp;
	Curate property listings, promotional offers, company updates, and educational content.
	Assist in developing downloadable resources (guides, reports) to support lead nurturing.
	Manage email marketing platforms (e.g., Mailchimp, ActiveCampaign, HubSpot, Sendinblue).
	Set up automated workflows for onboarding, property enquiries, follow-ups, and re-engagement.
	Implement A/B testing for subject lines, content, CTAs, and layouts.
	Track campaign performance metrics (open rate, click-through rate, conversions, bounce rate, unsubscribes).
	Provide weekly and monthly performance reports.
	Use insights to optimize email strategy and improve campaign ROI.


Compliance &amp; Best Practices:


	Ensure emails follow regulatory requirements (GDPR, anti-spam laws).
	Maintain best practices in deliverability, design, and list hygiene.
	Stay updated on email trends and real estate marketing innovations.


Requirements &amp; Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field.


Experience:


	2&ndash;4 years of experience in email marketing, preferably in real estate or fast-paced sales environments.
	Hands-on experience with email marketing tools and CRM systems.


Skills:


	Strong copywriting and content creation ability.
	Excellent understanding of email metrics and campaign optimization.
	Proficiency in automation workflows and segmentation strategies.
	Basic design skills (Canva, HTML email templates) is an advantage.
	Strong analytical and reporting skills.
	Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.


Key Competencies:


	Creativity and strategic thinking
	Strong communication skills
	Data-driven mindset
	Ownership and accountability
	Team collaboration
	Customer-centric approach


What we offer


	Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
	Career growth and professional development opportunities.
	Work in a dynamic and innovative real estate&nbsp;company
	Access to exclusive investment and tools
	Positive work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to:&nbsp;mshelrecruitment@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Procurement / Business Manager Job at Red Star Zhongyuan Group




        
    

        
        Red Star Zhongyuan Group was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, Fujian Province . we mainly conduct business in Nigeria and other western African countries. over the past 20 years of development, we have become a multinational corporation with diversified industrial clusters of iron and steel, chemical fibre, plastics, textile and lead-acid battery manufacturing based on the construction of circular economy industrial park.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:Procurement / Business Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The role of a business manager in a mining company is multifaceted, encompassing strategic planning, financial oversight, and operational management to ensure efficiency, profitability, safety, and compliance with regulations.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategic Planning and Growth: Identifying and prioritizing new business opportunities, analyzing market trends, and developing plans to shape the company's strategic direction and drive growth. This often involves activities like mergers and acquisitions analysis, market research, and developing business cases for new initiatives.
	Operational Oversight: Managing the day-to-day operations to ensure they are carried out efficiently, cost-effectively, and meet production targets. This includes optimizing resource allocation, managing inventory and logistics, and improving operational systems and processes.
	Financial Management: Overseeing budgets, financial forecasts, cost control, and ensuring the business operates within financial guidelines. They track costs, analyze financial metrics, and prepare reports for senior management to ensure alignment of capital and resource allocation with the budget.
	Team Leadership and Management: Leading, mentoring, and motivating teams across various departments to foster a positive and productive work environment. This includes hiring, training, performance management, and resolving conflicts.
	Compliance and Risk Management: Ensuring all operations adhere to relevant regulations, internal policies, and safety standards. In mining, this is critical due to the inherent safety and environmental regulations (e.g., MSHA in the US).
	Stakeholder Communication: Serving as a primary point of contact and effectively communicating with internal and external stakeholders, including senior management, employees, external partners, vendors, and government agencies.
	Ultimately, a business manager acts as a vital link between senior executives and on-site operations, applying strong leadership, problem-solving, and analytical skills to guide the company toward its goals and sustainable growth.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor’s / Master`s Degree with 3 - 10 years of experience.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: rszgrouphr@gmail.comusing the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
